data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Kalutara, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kalutara, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kalutara, Sri Lanka. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Kalutara against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Kalutara to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Radayo people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Radayo people.
Father, help the 14 believers in Kalutara to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 159,487 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Kalutara, Sri Lanka to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kalutara, Sri Lanka has a population of 159,500.

We estimate Kalutara has 14 people who might know Jesus, 12,202 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 147,285 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11,392 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Kalutara.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
